name: mindscope-ai
description: Multimodal Mental Health Analysis Web Application

scripts.backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv/Scripts/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python datasets/dataset_manager.py && uvicorn empath_app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
